descriptions:
['DescriptionWe are pleased to present this Exclusive listing to the Sales market. This beautiful three-bedroom upgraded apartment has now come available for sale in the Marina Crown tower. Marina Crown Tower is a high rise residential tower located at the start of the Dubai Marina, within easy reach of the Carrefour supermarket, the Tram Station and the Marina Walk. 
The apartment is located on a high floor and has been upgraded by the owner to give the apartment a completely different feel from any other three-bedroom in the building. From the moment you walk through the front door, the beautiful wooden flooring in the entrance and reception area catches your eyes as the light from the large bay windows bounces off the flooring and fills the apartment. The original kitchen has been stripped and has been completely rebuilt with a white open plan kitchen with a central island creating a partition between the kitchen and living room.  The 180 degrees balcony allows you to take in the view of the Dubai Eye, Atlantis and right over to the Burj Al Arab.  There are three good size double bedrooms positioned at the front of the tower offering a full sea view.  The facilities in the building include an outdoor pool and indoor gymnasium for residents.
This apartment also has a study/ tv room and a separate laundry area and 2 allocated parking spaces in the building.
Marina Crown is a well-positioned building in the Marina within walking distance to everything you need. 
Contact Gulf Sothebys International Realty today for your private viewing of this extraordinary property.']

['DescriptionPLEASE CALL JOSHUA SMITH ON +971509187488 TO ARRANGE A VIEWING
- RARE TYPE 4E
- CORNER PLOT
- 2 EN-SUITE BEDROOMS
- PRIVATE GARDEN
- CLOSE TO LAKE
- VACANT ON TRANSFER
- ASKING AED 1.4M
- VIEWINGS AVAILABLE
Brand New to market is this superb corner plot type 4E in the sought after Al Reem 2 community of Arabian Ranches.
The property comprises entrance hall leading into the open plan living and dining room, onto the fitted kitchen. There is a further downstairs study room, laundry area and guest WC. The property is light and airy with plenty of windows.
Upstairs the villa has 2 en-suite double bedrooms of which both have built in storage. The master bedroom benefits from a balcony to the rear.
Al Reem 2 has 2 park areas, a community pool as well as access to the large central lake in the middle of the Al Reems.
Arabian Ranches has a lovely community center with all amenities included as well as the much sought after JESS school.
Please call Joshua Smith on +971509187488 to arrange a viewing.']

['DescriptionLarge 2 Bedroom 1680 sqft
Front Unit
Full Burj Khalifa View
Building almost ready for handover
Completion April 2020
Selling for AED 2.9 Million
Call+971555763234
BLVD Heights epitomises what it means to live, work and thrive in the bustling centre of Dubai. Modelled on the typical New York and Chicago skyscrapers, this 53 and 46-storey twin-tower complex exudes luxury, elegance and contemporary chic. The beautifully arranged one, two, three and four-bedroom apartments, penthouses and duplexes are designed with your utmost convenience, comfort and wellbeing in mind.
CLOSE TO EVERYTHING YOU NEED
BLVD Heights rises alongside Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Boulevard across from The Opera District. The physical connection to the street allows residents to seamlessly settle into the surrounding urban reality, maximising the shopping, dining and cultural offerings of the neighbourhood, including The Dubai Mall, Souk Al Bahar and the Dubai Opera.............................................................................................................']
